findings.title: approve
findings.description: The approve function has a vulnerability marked with 🛑.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Function
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have proper validation and access control, which can lead to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as External and has a warning symbol, indicating potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The 'mint' function is declared as external and lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerabilities
findings.description: Multiple swap functions are identified with potential vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function does not have any access modifiers and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized state changes.
